titles.title: Protecting Gold Star Children Act of 2019
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to not apply changes under Public Law 115-97 pertaining to the kiddie tax to children receiving certain military survivor benefits.
Protecting Gold Star Children Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Protecting Gold Star Children Act of 2019
This bill treats certain military survivor benefits that are received by children as earned income of the child for the purposes of the kiddie tax (the tax on the unearned income of children). This has the effect of exempting the benefits from such tax.
